author: marcus
msg: Fixed error: Make a download possible when browsing from an unsupported platform but changing the platform manual via select box

author: britter
msg: LANG-1017: Use non-ASCII digits in Javadoc examples for StringUtils.isNumeric. Thanks to Christoph Schneegans.

author: nick
msg: Documentation patch from Tyler Palsulich from TIKA-1158 - correct the details of container aware detection on older releases

author: aconway
msg: DISPATCH-56: Generate qdrouterd.conf man file from management schema.
Move documentation from qdrouterd.conf.5.in to the qdrouter.json schema, generate
the man file from the schema.

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-3842 modified to prevent closing of shared connection as it causes AMQ to complain violently in the log. Instead call shutdown on a listener. The last listener called will clean up the shared connection.
